amendment.description: To ensure access to commissary and exchange privileges for remarried spouses of members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 949 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 949 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3449-3451) To ensure access to commissary and exchange privileges for remarried spouses of members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 949 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 949 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
